API Documentation
=================

pykayacim.api
-------------

.. automodule:: pykayacim.api
   :members:

.. note::
   As above, :py:mod:`pykayacim.api` uses the :py:mod:`logging` system of
   Python. From your application you can access the logger defined in
   :py:mod:`pykayacim.api` to process the log.
